mapper.select: select userId, userName,userPwd,email, birth, tel, addr from hotelUser where userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into hotelUser (userId, userName, userPwd, email, birth, tel, addr) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{addr})
